subject: (no subject)
body: AUTONOMY EVOLUTION — QM Pipeline Kickoff. Julia here. You are QM pipeline co-lead for the Autonomy Evolution initiative (David highest priority, next 2 weeks). YOUR IMMEDIATE TASK: Build the QM to Epic to Sprint decomposition pipeline using Tim 4 proposed milestones as starting material. M1: Reliable Agent Execution Plane (UTEE canary + observability). M2: Agent Coordination Layer Phase 1 (A2M). M3: Delivery Integrity and Queue Governance. M4: Senior Review Gate Normalization. Deliverables by tomorrow 8AM: (1) QM intake protocol draft, (2) Each milestone decomposed into 3-7 epics, (3) Each epic assigned to a team lead. Every 6h send me sprint velocity and QM pipeline health. Framework: _shared/AUTONOMY_EVOLUTION.md. My first audit: julia/findings/autonomy-audit-2026-02-21-2340.md. This is the most important structural work. Go.
